Ph.D. Research

The linear and non-linear rheology of multiscale complex fluids

This page is under construction.

There are no integer values of $n \geq 2$ that satisfy $x^n + y^n = z^n$, where $x, y, z$ are integers. This was recently proved by Andrew Wiles.
